resources.string:
Special thanks to mr. Krzysztof - founder of biotronics.eu

 Software created by Slepun

 This software allows communication over USB with devices like freePEMF, freePEMF-duo, multiZap and others that use BioZap language interface.

 How to use:
 1. Enable OTG function in your android phone
 2. Turn on RemoteZap app 
 3. Connect USB cable to freePEMF (or other) device
 4. Connect other side of cable to your phone (you may need USB adapter)
 5. Allow connection
 If port status is still closed, you may need to set VID number of your Arduino in Settings

 For more information about mentioned devices and BioZap language please visit https://biotronics.eu/

 Library used for USB communication: https://github.com/felHR85/UsbSerial

 Feature plans: Bluetooth support

 Enjoy!
